Name: Leaf Me Alone
About the game: Clean up all the grounds by controlling the cute cleaning robot A-12! Vacuum everything such as leaves, twigs, or even cans!   Please try to carry the big objects when it’s hard to vacuum.   You can clean more efficiently by upgrading your robot.   You can obtain cute and cool loadouts!     Gain true satisfaction by viewing the tidiness of the place where you just cleaned! There is no competition or pressure when you clean. Enjoy cleaning while you are relaxed and comfortable.   Introduction of Cream   Cream is a grassroots company from Seoul, South Korea who develop indie games. Our team is made up of three individuals. We would like to further improve and introduce better quality games.
